Technology has improved immensely in recent days. Improving the quality of oneâ€™s life is an important benefit of technology in healthcare. Besides, it also reduces the burden of staff in the hospital and improves the health of the patient easily and efficiently.
The three keys in the healthcare sector are
Technological enablement Digitization Automation This transformation with the Hospital Management System switches traditional hospitals into Smart Hospitals. Moreover. Smart hospitals have the potential for exponential growth.
Smart Hospitals are in high demand in the 21st century. The market value of smart hospitals accounted for 22.2 billion USD in 2018. However, in 2021, it has risen to 35.9 billion USD. Moreover, the estimated market value in 2026 is 83.1 billion USD!!! Thus, technology is essentially a catalyst in the healthcare industry. (Source: Statista)
